original_title: Pachhi Kehta Nahi Ke Kahyun Nahotu
overview: A family discovers their intellectually challenged daughter is a positive influence rather than an encumbrance in this touching drama from India. When they face a major crisis, the daughter unexpectedly helps them weather their difficulties with grace. Written by Nimesh Shah and directed by Dharmesh Vyas -- who also makes an appearance -- the film stars Alpana Buch, Dilip Darbar, Jay Kapadia, Amita Rajda and Surabhi Vyas.
title: Pachhi Kehta Nahi Ke Kahyun Nahotu
